amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account by $10 million and to reduce the Department of Energy Administrative Account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Department of Energy, Energy Programs, Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy Account by $10 million and reduce the Department of Energy Administrative Account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 200 (Roll no. 312).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 200 (Roll no. 312).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Kaptur.
